title: Small e-commerce
description: This e-commerce website was built using Redux Toolkit and RTK Query. It features category-based filtering, product sorting, and a search functionality.

title: Simple YouTube clone
description: This website is a partial clone of YouTube, replicating core features such as video playback and comment viewing.

title: E-commerce
description: This e-commerce website includes features such as adding items to a wishlist, adding to and removing from the shopping cart, along with several other functionalities.

title: Blog site with auth
description: This blog website was built with user authentication (register and login) and full CRUD functionality.
